title: Post 50- NO. YOU KNOW WHAT. FUCK YOU.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Check two players and see if either of them are one of your "targets"
- Choose a player and attack them if they're one of your "targets"

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players with roles that refer to another Post number are considered your "targets". (if there are not at least three, then additional random players are considered to be your targets until you are at three.)
- You have powerful defense against your "Targets"

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see all your "targets" dead

desc:
Post 5085
*Im tired of all these lame DSF roles that rely on other roles, screw them.*
